sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-app-bar>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

      <v-toolbar-title>MyTodoList</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-main>
      <!--  -->
      <nav>
        <router-link to="/">Todo List</router-link> |
        <router-link to="/about">Archive</router-link>
        <router-link to="/albo">Albo</router-link>
        <router-link to="/login">Login</router-link>
      </nav>
      <router-view/>
    </v-main>

    <v-navigation-drawer
        image="https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/backgrounds/bg-2.jpg"
        permanent
        theme="dark"
        v-model="drawer"
        app
      >
        <v-list nav>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-email" title="Inbox" value="inbox">Item 1</v-list-item>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-account-supervisor-circle" title="Supervisors" value="supervisors">Item 2</v-list-item>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-clock-start" title="Clock-in" value="clockin">Item 3</v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

    
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    name: "App",
    data: () => ({ drawer: null }),
  };
</script>
